original_text: For the ministry of this service is not only supplying the needs of the saints but is also overflowing in many thanksgivings to God.
korean_text: 이 봉사의 직무가 성도들의 부족한 것을 보충할 뿐 아니라 사람들이 하나님께 드리는 많은 감사로 말미암아 넘쳤느니라

sentences.original_text: For the ministry of this service
is not only supplying the needs of the saints
but is also overflowing in many thanksgivings to God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께 드리는 많은 감사로 넘쳐나기도 합니다
